review: I love my Fire TV Stick.  I used to have a 25 foot HDMI cable from my laptop to the tv and the Fire TV Stick allowed me to remove that.  It arrived ready to go.  All I had to do was give it my wireless network info and it was up and running.  In hindsight I only regret not upgrading to voice capabilities.
author: Jonathan L

review: I'm pleased with this product.  I ordered it on special and received it just before Christmas.  Since then we've been watching a lot of Prime films (I purchased prime after receiving this...it really doesn't work all that well without Prime).  So far I haven't purchased any new releases, but it's fun to go through all the old releases and there are plenty available on prime.  Until this point, my kids have probably gotten the most use out of this while watching the various kids shows that are available.  All in all, I think this item is reasonably priced and well made.  It's cheaper than most Cable TV subscriptions, and you can download Youtube which contains hours of viewing all on its own.
